thought: To craft an activator_rail, I need to place 6 iron ingots, 1 redstone torch, and 2 sticks in the crafting grid. I have 6 iron ingots at slot 21, so I will start by moving one of them to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
